Initializer# init(shouldLoop:shouldRandomizeStartTime:normalization:calibration:mixGroupName:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    shouldLoop: Bool = false,
    shouldRandomizeStartTime: Bool = false,
    normalization: AudioResource.Normalization? = nil,
    calibration: AudioResource.Calibration? = nil,
    mixGroupName: String? = nil
)
```
